capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving effective pest control outcomes and ensuring activities are integrated with broader pest management strategies.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Responsible for planning and prioritising pest control activities and ensuring compliance with safety and legislative requirements.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Needs to develop practical solutions for pest control challenges and ensure safe work practices.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Accountable for the safety and effectiveness of pest control operations, including compliance with legislation and policies.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Supervises and trains staff and volunteers in pest control techniques and safety procedures.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Motivates team members by communicating the importance of their role in preserving natural environments.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Promotes and supports changes in pest control practices to improve effectiveness and safety.

capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: Demonstrates resilience in challenging outdoor conditions and courage in making tough decisions.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Upholds ethical standards and complies with all relevant legislation and policies.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Effectively communicates with a diverse range of stakeholders, including volunteers, staff, and the community.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaborates with team members, other NPWS staff, and external partners to achieve pest control objectives.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Applies project management principles to plan, execute, and oversee pest control projects.

skills.name: Pest Management
skills.description: Knowledge and experience in pest animal control techniques and strategies.

skills.name: Legislation Compliance
skills.description: Understanding of and adherence to firearms legislation and safety regulations.

skills.name: Team Leadership
skills.description: Ability to lead, motivate, and develop a team of staff and volunteers.

skills.name: Safety Procedures
skills.description: Implementation and monitoring of safe work practices in pest control operations.

generalRole.title: Environmental Operations Supervisor
generalRole.description: This role involves supervising and coordinating field operations related to environmental conservation, specifically focusing on pest control within national parks. It requires a blend of technical knowledge in pest management, leadership skills, and a commitment to safety and environmental preservation.
